page.title: 02Islam
page.content: My name is Mohammed Ashraf Miah. I am 15 years old. I am a Muslim. Islam is a complete way of life. The guidance is from Allah, the creator of the universe. I believe in the prophet Mohammed and in one God, Allah. The Mosque is a place of worship for Muslims. The Mosque is on Middleton Road, Westwood, which is near my house. I should go to the Mosque and pray five times a day. I go at the following times, 4am, 7pm, 9.30pm, llpm. I will also go at 2pm when I leave school. When I get to the Mosque I pray to God and read the holy Qur'an. The Mosque consists of two houses. There are nine rooms which have been made into two big rooms. The cost of the alterations was met by the muslims and the local council in early 1980.
